channel.title: Varrock Sewers - Crumble Undead- Mage Trainer
channel.description:
There is a spot in the Varrock Sewers where you can stand on one side of a river, and then theres a whole lotta zombies on the other side, and all the script has to do is cast crumble undead on the visible zombies.
If you need directions/screenshots, then please just let me know.
I used to have a script like this a long time ago, and it worked out really good, got me to over 60 mage in a short while.
Thanks to anyone that can help :)

item.title: Varrock Sewers - Crumble Undead- Mage Trainer
item.dc:creator: @hdkilla HDKilla
item.description:
@hdkilla wrote:

Ok, I found the old script, it still works, but it needs to be updated badlyâ€¦

Im going to post it on SRL as well and see if they can do something with it over there.

But its here in case anyone wishes to update it.

item.title: Varrock Sewers - Crumble Undead- Mage Trainer
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I wish I had this a long time ago, I got 70 magic down there fully legit a long time ago. Would be nice to have to train my mage that finally got unbanned
